subject: clone()
msgSnippet: The next time someone is making changes to JUnit, could said person add clone() implementations to the various implementations of Test?  It would be handy for
messageBody:
The next time someone is making changes to JUnit, could said person add
clone() implementations to the various implementations of Test? It
would be handy for some thing I'm doing....
